screensframework

Class JSONUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • screensframework.JSONUtils

  • public class JSONUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Adapted from a YouTube video by @TheAnimeNerd2009, this class controls the input streams from the JSON database.
    Author:
    Mark Backhouse and Fraz Ahmad

        public static java.lang.String getJSONStringFromFile(java.lang.String path)
                                              throws java.io.IOException
        This method takes a JSON file and returns it as a String.
        Parameters:
        path - the path of the file.
        Returns:
        the contents of the JSON file as a String.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the file cannot be found.

      • getJSONObjectFromFile

        public static org.json.JSONObject getJSONObjectFromFile(java.lang.String path)
                                                 throws org.json.JSONException,
                                                        java.io.IOException
        Returns the JSON Object inside a JSON file.
        Parameters:
        path - the path of the file.
        Returns:
        the JSON Object inside the file.
        Throws:
        org.json.JSONException - if the JSON Object cannot be returned.
        java.io.IOException - if the file cannot be found.

      • objectExists

        public static boolean objectExists(org.json.JSONObject jsonObject,
                                   java.lang.String key)
        Checks whether or not a JSON Object with a predefined key exists.
        Parameters:
        jsonObject - the JSON Object.
        key - the key of the object.
        Returns:
        true if the object exists, false otherwise.
